item.title: [PIG-1721] New logical plan: script fail when reuse foreach inner alias
item.description:
The following script fail:

a = load '1.txt' as (a0:int, a1:map[]);

b = filter a by a0==1;

c = FOREACH b {
        b0 = a1#'key1';
        generate ((b0 is null or b0 == '')?1:0);
}

dump c;

In the foreach inner plan, b0 is used twice.

comments.comment: PIG-1721-0.patch give the idea how to fix it. It is not a full patch. Also notice this patch is only for 0.8, cuz LogicalExpPlanMigrationVistor is gone in 0.9, I will coordinate with Xuefu to see whether to solve it in parser or LogToPhyTranslationVisitor.

Here is another test case of the same nature:

A = load 'data' AS (query:chararray, type:chararray, freq:int);
B = group A by query;

C = foreach B {

    click = filter A by (type == 'c');
    pv = filter A by (type == 'p');
    click_sum = (IsEmpty(click.freq)? 0 : SUM(click.freq));

    generate
        COUNT(click),
        COUNT(pv),
        click_sum;
}

dump C;
